channel.title: Warning to Server Owners! A hacker // And need help
channel.description: Someone called "Bumpter Baby" is hacking people's server and is now currently attacking my friends server. He is admin but we never made him admin. tried ip banning it dosnt work. We need advice on how to get rid of him please. THIS IS A WARNING TO ALL SERVER OWNERS

item.title: Warning to Server Owners! A hacker // And need help
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Ha, I remember when you crashed a bunch of servers with that and everyone was freaking out. Good times.
But how was it any different than a regular socket flooder?

Read full topic

item.title: Warning to Server Owners! A hacker // And need help
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:10, topic:178747”][quote author=BurnInSilence link=topic=239765.msg2033976#msg2033976 date=1202257853]
hes not “hacking”
hes using a cheat client
maybe 5 people out of the mopar community/players know how to, either malformed ping some one off their connection
or transfer a file through a open port
[/quote]
Cheat clients have nothing to do with fucking serverside variables unless they’re sent in packets.
If he attacks my server I’ll just ban his hostname DUN.[/quote]
^Yea i know =\

Read full topic

item.source: Warning to Server Owners! A hacker // And need help

item.title: Warning to Server Owners! A hacker // And need help
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“ry60003333, post:13, topic:178747”][quote author=skiller noob1 link=topic=239765.msg2034058#msg2034058 date=1202262150]
Where do you get a cheat client? Are they safe?
[/quote]
Thats the thing, you can’t really get one. All you can do is have it send packets to the server, and make it seem like you have stuff you don’t. For example, my client has one cheat in it to crack a fake Christmas Cracker on someone, but the servers never check if you really have a cracker so I can go around making Party Hats.
But as far as I know there’s not many easy to get “cheat” clients.[/quote]
I made my own.
The only packets I could really do shit with is the items on players packet (as you said, useful),
the magic on npcs and players packet (the one for npcs is very useful because you can sometimes hit the npcs when they are dead, and if there isn’t a timer you can repeatedly hit them by autoing ::mnpc index spellID), the attack npcs and players packet (hit people from far away with a bow, same with the magic packet!), and the item on object packet (They usually don’t require you to be anywhere near the object, you just use it from anywhere).
Oh, and if servers use glory amulets the alternative item option packet.

I forgot an important one; the magic on items packet for alching.
This eliminates the purpose of using the item on player packet if they check your items or using a cracker on a player does nothing, but the item on player packet is uber 1337ness if it’s the other way around.

Read full topic
item.source: Warning to Server Owners! A hacker // And need help

item.title: Warning to Server Owners! A hacker // And need help
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Thats the thing, you can’t really get one. All you can do is have it send packets to the server, and make it seem like you have stuff you don’t. For example, my client has one cheat in it to crack a fake Christmas Cracker on someone, but the servers never check if you really have a cracker so I can go around making Party Hats.
But as far as I know there’s not many easy to get “cheat” clients.

Read full topic

item.title: Warning to Server Owners! A hacker // And need help
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Ok get this:
Your playerRights are set server-side, so cheat clients won’t do anything. Like xx qwertyuiop xx said, it has nothing to do with the freakin server!

Anyway…
It probably isn’t really a hacker. There are loads of commands in server’s that the owner won’t know about. For example there was a command in many sources that made the player an admin, and IP-banning on todays servers almost never works.

Read full topic

item.title: Warning to Server Owners! A hacker // And need help
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Be smart.

Load all your admins, mods, owners, from a file.

In client class declare this:

If a person who logs in and has a playerRights greater than 0 and the name is not found in the file where the admin and mods are located, then ban his ip, disconnect them, and get onto your life.

Read full topic

maybe his acc was an admin before you dled the source and you havent chnaged hes rights to 0

EDIT: Tell your friend to go into char then look for a notepad form with the “hacker” account name it should say

character-rights = 0 if it says = 1 = 2 or = 3 change it back to 0
